bundled_addons.description: Optional GLB post-import processing for Fab conventions

description: Minimal Fab-compatible Godot template with FabLevelLoader for dynamic GLB loading, first-person player controller, and Web export preset
why: Base template for Fab World Godot integration stage. Automatically detects SPAWN_PLAYER markers, COLLIDER_* meshes, TRIGGER_* areas, and INTERACT_* objects in imported GLB files.
notes: Uses Compatibility renderer for WebGL support
Expects level.glb at assets/level.glb by default (configurable)
Supports both FAB naming (SPAWN_PLAYER) and Outora naming (ol_spawn_player)
